price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ rìn lórí ilẹ̀, kí ẹ wo bí àtubọ̀tán àwọn tó ṣíwájú ṣe rí! Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ wọn ni wọ́n jẹ́ ọ̀ṣẹbọ.”
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلُۚ كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablu kāna aktharuhum mush'rikīna
